name: Castle Master TD
description:
CASTLE MASTER TD

Fortify, Strategize, and Conquer in our dynamic tower defense game.



As master of your own castle, you’ll build powerful structures, plan strategic defences, and engage in epic battles against relentless enemies.
Each choice you make shapes your kingdom’s destiny.

Rise to the challenge, display your strategic prowess, and ensure your castle’s survival against all odds.



This isn’t just a game – it’s a test of strength, strategy, and survival!

Awesome Features:

Castle Master TD combines the nostalgic charm of Tetris-like gameplay with the strategic depth of a tower defence game. Players build their castle using falling blocks, each with its unique defensive function, and strategically place knights and defensive machines to fend off waves of enemies.
